step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're doing well with the arm movement. Focus on keeping your elbows slightly bent as you stretch your arms back overhead.
Excellent work making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the good work relaxing your muscles.
You're consistently following the steps. Continue to focus on the coordinated movement of your arms and squeezing your shoulder blades.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms stretched overhead with fingers open, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you relax and stretch your arms back.
